remarks: Property of a finitely generated left module.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
islmodfg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
islmodfg.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
islmodfg $p |- ( W e. LMod -> ( W e. LFinGen <-> E. b e. ~P B ( b e. Fin /\ ( N ` b ) = B ) ) ) $.
$d B b $.
$d N b $.
$d W b $.
